title: Emerald Radiance Jhumka - Vaidehi Kundan
materials: and Seed Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Classic Jhumka silhouette with intricate Kundan setting. The design features a teardrop emerald accentuating the top section. Delicately handcrafted detailing throughout the bell-shaped dome, ending with a fringe of pearl drops. The lattice work in the Jhumka allows light to catch the Kundan stones beautifully.
colors: and Creamy White Pearls. This combination is a timeless classic in South Indian Jewelry.
occasions: and family gatherings. Also suitable for contemporary events where you want to add a touch of traditional elegance. Ideal for Muhurtham
description: Exquisite craftsmanship and timeless design. The Emerald Radiance Jhumka is a statement piece that beautifully blends traditional Kundan artistry with modern sensibilities. High-quality materials ensure durability and lasting shine. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
